articles.title: How Well Is Boston Scientific Placed for Long-Term Endoscopy Growth?
articles.mainIdea: How Well Is Boston Scientific Placed for Long-Term Endoscopy Growth?
articles.summary: Zacks: How Well Is Boston Scientific Placed for Long-Term Endoscopy Growth?. BSX's Endoscopy unit targets an $8B market, spanning pancreaticobiliary, surgery and obesity, with plans to outgrow the market. Related tickers mentioned: BSX, EW.

articles.title: Is Fidelity Medical Equipment the Ultimate "Forever Fund" for Health Care Investors?
articles.mainIdea: Is Fidelity Medical Equipment the Ultimate "Forever Fund" for Health Care Investors?
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Is Fidelity Medical Equipment the Ultimate "Forever Fund" for Health Care Investors?. This basket of 64 medical device stocks could raise its dividend for decades. Related tickers mentioned: XLV.

articles.title: Abbott Stock May Benefit Following Volt PFA's FDA Approval
articles.mainIdea: Abbott Stock May Benefit Following Volt PFA's FDA Approval
articles.summary: Zacks: Abbott Stock May Benefit Following Volt PFA's FDA Approval. ABT wins FDA approval for its Volt PFA System for AFib, paving the way for U.S. launches and EU expansion after earlier CE Mark clearance.
